channel.title: NYS:KVUE on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in NYS:KVUE on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Kenvue Sinks on Report RFK Jr. Will Link Tylenol to Autism
item.description: Kenvue Inc.’s shares fell after the Wall Street Journal reported that Health Secretary Robert F. Kennedy Jr. is likely to link the company’s Tylenol painkiller to autism.
